name: Playbook: Stories with Choices
summary: You will get compelling interactive stories about the supernatural, betrayal, love, and friendship which will take you to many different endings. Make decisions that really matter and along the way, find hidden objects, assemble torn pictures, look for differences between pictures, or pick a lock to open the secret drawer. The best collection of story games with choices is waiting for you! Download Playbook: Interactive Story Games today and enjoy a storytelling masterpiece.
